description: Campari is a potent, bitter liqueur (Italian&nbsp;aperitif) that has been used in modern drinks. Its flavor profile consists of hints of orange peel, cherry with clove, and cinnamon.This Campari cocktail recipe is perfect as an after-dinner drink. It's also great to serve at parties and other gatherings. The ingredients are simple, but the taste is complex and elegant.
name: Campari Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: Pour vodka, Campari, and Aromatic bitters into an ice-filled shaker. Shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour vodka, Campari, and Aromatic bitters into an ice-filled shaker. Shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain drink into a chilled cocktail glass or serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.
